EmailTemplate.name: Internal Response
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Colleague,
Thank you for contacting us. Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, please reply to this e-mail.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
